detail_desc: Long kimono in a patterned weave with decorative lace embroidery, dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves. Front pockets, narrow ties on the inside and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jersey body in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the bust, narrow shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Boots in glossy imitation leather with reversible sequins, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim around the neckline. Double layer at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Maxi skirt in an airy patterned weave with an elasticated waist, and flounce at the centre and hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.

Imitation leather biker jacket with a diagonal zip and press-studs on the lapels. Zipped side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a small, frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocked, frilled cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Sewn in jersey underdress.

Short, round-necked dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves. Frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders, a seam at the waist and a decorative scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.

Short, round-necked dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves. Frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders, a seam at the waist and a decorative scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.

Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets, flap leg pockets, seams at the knees and narrow hems.
Double-breasted, straight-cut jacket in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with notch lapels and fake front pockets with a flap. Lined.

Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with rippled, overlocked edges at the hems. One pair with a frill at the back and one pair with an all-over print.
